Package edu.ncsu.csc216.hloj.model.manager

Class OrderManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.hloj.model.manager.OrderManager
  • public class OrderManager
extends java.lang.Object
    OrderManager manages all of the orders for HowlLotOfJava through a SortedList list of orders.
    Author:
    Ashten Herr, Claire Davis

    • Method Summary
